rev.comment: /* History */ um, wow, super [[WP:NPOV|POV]], and uncited as well... and what was the result of the strike? if this isn't expanded upon and cited, i'll delete the whole thing

Line 73: Line 73:
2003:
2003:
â
After months of frustrating negotiations, the faculty went on strike in late November and into the first two days of December of 2003. During this time, the University administration stopped paying into their share of the faculty health insurance and other benefits, causing virtually all faculty members involved in the labor action to receive December paychecks that were a fraction of their normal monthly salary.
+
After months of negotiations, the faculty went on strike in late November and into the first two days of December of 2003. During this time, the University administration stopped paying into their share of the faculty health insurance and other benefits, causing nearly all faculty members involved in the strike to receive December paychecks that were a fraction of their normal monthly salary.{{fact}}
